message: Let's split it 7:3, a fair start to our negotiations!
You're starting too high, let's meet in the middle!
You're not meeting me in the middle, let's try again!
You're moving up, but I'm still not satisfied!
You're still not moving, I'm taking control now!
I'm not backing down, let's meet somewhere in the middle this time!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time!
